amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill to pay the salary of any officer or employee of the Department of Homeland Security who approves immigration petitions for relatives, fiances, or workers coming from Brazil.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services to provide visas to Brazilians.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 50 - 373, 1 Present (Roll no. 202).
